column4: no 1 who can give any input on how to speed up the mailing process? i'm just postfix at the moment and i guess there might be a) a better software to use or 2) configurations that i can make to speed it up
how did you try to restart it?
what happens if you do '/etc/init.d/apache2 stop'?  Can you check if apache is still running?
k, so can you check if apache is running?
please use a pastebin and talk in the channel
well you can either kill apache yourself or reboot
k, try 'sudo pkill apache2' as was suggested then
